name: Zoom
natural_language_description: 这是 Zoom 节点。主要用于: Consume Zoom API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: meeting

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many meetings

topic.name: topic
topic.natural_language_description: 参数名: Topic | 作用: Topic of the meeting

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: scheduleForReminder (值: None) - Whether to notify hosts and alternative hosts about meeting cancellation via email

meetingId.name: meetingId
meetingId.natural_language_description: 参数名: ID | 作用: Meeting ID | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 30

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: password (值: None) - Password to join the meeting with maximum 10 characters
scheduleFor (值: None) - Schedule meeting for someone else from your account, provide their email ID
startTime (值: None) - Start time should be used only for scheduled or recurring meetings with fixed time
timeZone (值: None) - Time zone used in the response. The default is the time zone of the calendar. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
